oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Statue of Virtue on the grounds of the Tennessee Centennial Exposition

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial celebrations; Sculpture; Stereographs
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Stereograph showing the back of a statue depicting Virtue at the Tennessee Centennial Exposition. The statue is on the edge of a lily pond and stands beneath a waterfall.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lingley, B. L.
